attributes.documentation: @title The Controller interface provides access to an external list of controllers.
attributes.name: Controller

attributes.documentation: @title Controllable implements access control functionality based on an external list of controllers.
attributes.name: Controllable

attributes.documentation:
@dev Constructor initializes the controller contract object.
 @param _controller address of the controller contract.
@dev Checks if message sender is a controller.
attributes.name: onlyController

attributes.documentation: @return true if the provided account is a controller.
attributes.name: isController

attributes.documentation:
@dev Changes the address of the controller contract.
 @param _controller address of the new controller contract.
attributes.name: newController

attributes.documentation: @title Ownable has an owner address and provides basic authorization control functions.
attributes.name: Ownable

attributes.documentation: @dev Constructor sets the original owner of the contract and the maximum number of ownership transfers.
@dev Reverts if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a new address.
 @param _account address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation: @return the address of the owner.
attributes.name: owner

attributes.documentation: @return true if the ownership is transferable.
attributes.name: isTransferable

attributes.documentation: @return true if sender is the owner of the contract.
attributes.name: isOwner

attributes.documentation: @title ERC20 is a subset of the ERC20 specification.
attributes.name: ERC20

attributes.documentation: @title ERC165 specifies a standard way of querying if a contract implements an interface.
attributes.name: ERC165

attributes.documentation: @title Oracle converts ERC20 token amounts into equivalent ether amounts based on cryptocurrency exchange rates.
attributes.name: Oracle

attributes.documentation: @title Resolver returns the controller contract address.
attributes.name: Resolver

attributes.documentation: @title Whitelist provides payee-whitelist functionality.

attributes.documentation: @title SpendLimit provides daily spend limit functionality.
attributes.name: SpendLimit

attributes.documentation: @dev Constructor initializes the daily spend limit.

@dev Returns the available daily balance - accounts for daily limit reset.
 @return amount of ether in wei.
attributes.name: spendAvailable

attributes.documentation:
@dev Initialize a daily transfer limit for non-whitelisted addresses.
 @param _amount is the daily limit amount in wei.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "spend limit has already been initialized"

attributes.type: literal_string "spend limit has already been initialized"
attributes.value: spend limit has already been initialized

 @param _amount is the daily limit amount in wei.
